thread.title: Lynx to have breakfast with governor, parade
thread.title_full: Lynx to have breakfast with governor, parade

title: Lynx to have breakfast with governor, parade
text:
Lynx to have breakfast with governor, parade Gov. Mark Dayton will proclaim Friday as "Minnesota Lynx Day" and host the WNBA champions for breakfast. Post to Facebook Lynx to have breakfast with governor, parade Gov. Mark Dayton will proclaim Friday as "Minnesota Lynx Day" and host the WNBA champions for breakfast.  //www.kare11.com/story/sports/wnba/lynx/2015/10/15/wnba-champion-lynx-to-have-breakfast-with-governor-parade/74022198/   Join the Conversation To   Lynx to have breakfast with governor, parade Associated Press, Associated Press 8:14 p.m. EDT October 15, 2015 The Minnesota Lynx beat the Indiana Fever to earn their third WNBA championship at Target Center in Minneapolis on Wednesday, October 14, 2015. (Photo: Ben Garvin / KARE) 4 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
MINNEAPOLIS -- Gov. Mark Dayton will proclaim Friday as "Minnesota Lynx Day" and host the WNBA champions for breakfast. 
The Lynx captured their third championship in five seasons with a 69-52 win Wednesday over the Indiana Fever in Game 5 of the 2015 WNBA Finals. Prince serenaded the Lynx at Paisley Park, where the celebration lasted until early hours Thursday. 
President Barack Obama called Lynx coach Cheryl Reeve with his congratulations Thursday. He says he looks forward to their visit to the White House to congratulate the players in person. 
After breakfast with the governor Friday, the Lynx will celebrate their title with a parade up Hennepin Avenue in downtown Minneapolis. Sections of Hennepin Avenue and Seventh Street will close for approximately 90 minutes for the parade. It starts at 11:30 a.m. and ends at Target Center where a celebration begins at 12:15 p.m. The event is free. 
For more information, visit the Minnesota Lynx website . Read or Share this story: http://www.kare11.com/story/sports/wnba/lynx/2015/10/15/wnba-champion-lynx-to-have-breakfast-with-governor-parade/74022198/ TOP VIDEOS
